predicate.note: Frames file for 'stuff' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'fill', 'pack'.

example.name: stuff into
example.text: A dozen white office workers fold newsletters and stuff them into envelopes .

example.name: stuff with
example.text: Another she stuffed [*T*-1] with eight `` rectilinear hedges '' for a topiary geometry lesson in the right-angling of plants .
example.arg: for a topiary geometry lesson in the right-angling of plants
